import React, { useState } from 'react' import blogService from '../services/blogs' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const CreateNewBlogWindow = ({ addBlog }) => { const [title, setTitle] = useState() const [url, setUrl] = useState() const [author, setAuthor] = useState() const handleNewBlog = (e) => { e.preventDefault() let newBlog = { title: title, url: url, author: author } console.log('posting blog:', newBlog) blogService.postNewBlog(newBlog) setTitle('') setUrl('') setAuthor('') addBlog(newBlog) } return ( <>

create new

setTitle(target.value)}>
setAuthor(target.value)}>
setUrl(target.value)}>
) } CreateNewBlogWindow.propTypes = { addBlog: PropTypes.func.isRequired } export default CreateNewBlogWindow
